name: feed_in_profile_for_solar_thermal_heat_plant_HSN_inRET
title: feed-in profile for solar thermal heat plant
description: feed-in-profile for solar thermal heat plant. The solar thermal feed-in profile was calculated synthetically using a time step simulation in accordance with VDI 3988 {1}. A standard flat-plate collector with an inclination of 45°, a south-facing orientation and an average collector temperature of 50°C was assumed. The irradiation data represent the long-term (1996-2005) average irradiation for the Würzburg location. This results in a specific annual collector yield of 422 kWh/m². The data was collected in the ZO.RRO II project by Nordhausen University of Applied Science.
